dc_description_s: This dataset contains street centerlines for vehicular and foot traffic in Allegheny County. Street Centerlines are classified as Primary Road, Secondary Road, Unpaved Road, Limited Access Road, Connecting Road, Jeep Trail, Walkway, Stairway, Alleyway and Unknown. Modified by GDR for the Allegheny County CAD project, October 2008. Data is updated by County staff as changes and corrections are found, on a continuous basis. Updates are sent to PASDA monthly.
dc_creator_sm: Allegheny County Division of Computer Services Geographic Information Systems Group; Modified by GDR for the Allegheny County CAD project, October 2008.
